thread.title: Biden laughs off questions about possible 2016 campaign
thread.title_full: Biden laughs off questions about possible 2016 campaign

title: Biden laughs off questions about possible 2016 campaign
text:
CBS News October 15, 2015, 2:39 PM Joe Biden laughs off reporters' questions about 2016 campaign Shares 
Vice President Biden used humor to deflect reporters' questions Thursday about whether he plans to run for president in 2016 . 
Biden spoke to the press before greeting South Korean President Park Geun-hye at his residence. 
"Are you running for president?" one reporter asked. 
"I'll answer in Korean," he responded. 
"Have you made your decision yet?" she said, trying again. 
"I can't hear you," was Biden's response. So she repeated the question, prompting Biden to hold up his hands and laugh. 
"Is there still an opening for you in the race, sir?" another reporter asked. 
"I'm here to greet President Park. I'll talk to you all about that later," he said. When the reporter asked whether Democrats deserve his decision, Biden laughed. Â© 2015 CBS Interactive Inc. All Rights Reserved. Shares
